verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4427>reigns<s%>; let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7264>tremble<s%>: he <S%H3427>sits<s%> between the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>; let the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H5120>moved<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; and he is <S%H7311>high<s%> above all the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Let them <S%H3034>praise<s%> your <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>; for it is <S%H6918>holy<s%>.

The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5797>strength<s%> also <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; you do <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H4339>equity<s%>, you <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
<S%H7311>Exalt<s%> you the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H7272>footstool<s%>; for he is <S%H6918>holy<s%>.

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> among his <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> among them that <S%H7121>call<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name<s%>; they <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and he answered <S%H6030>them<s%>.
He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto them in the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%>: they <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, and the <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> that he gave <S%H5414>them<s%>.

You <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, O Lord our <S%H430>God<s%>: you were a <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5375>forgave<s%> <S%H5358>them<s%>, though you took vengeance of their <S%H5949>inventions<s%>.
<S%H7311>Exalt<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%>; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6918>holy<s%>.
